string.text: Chance of Surrender: High
Chance of Surrender: Very High
You cannot attack this party for {LORD_BRIBE_COOLDOWN} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\\?}.
I can pay you for my safe passage. Here is {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. Just take it and let me and my troops go.[if:idle_angry][ib:nervous]
A wise choice for you and your troops. You are free to go.
None of you are going anywhere. I want prisoners.
I can't fight you. I yield. I am at your mercy.[if:idle_angry][ib:nervous]
I would rather fight than be taken prisoner.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
You cannot attack this settlement for {SETTLEMENT_BRIBE_COOLDOWN} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\\?}.
We are low on food. There is no need to starve us. We can pay you to end the siege. Here is {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. Just take it and have mercy on us.
I will have mercy on you for now. You have escaped doom, but not for long.
What a joke! You will stop starving when this settlement falls... or when you fall.
We are out of food. We don't want to starve any longer. We yield.
Defenders request to parley
The defenders sound a horn and open the gates. A messenger rides out towards your camp and requests to parley.
Chance of Bribe
Multiplier for chance of bribe. Default is 1.0.
Chance of Surrender
Multiplier for chance of surrender. Default is 1.0.
Settlement Nutrition Bonus
Multiplier for a besieged settlement's nutrition bonus. Default is 1.0.
Settlement Starvation Penalty
Multiplier for a besieged settlement's starvation penalty. Default is 1.0.
Bribe Amount
Multiplier for the bribe amount. Default is 1.0.
Bribe Cooldowns
Lord Bribe Cooldown
Number of days cooldown for lord bribes. Default is 10.
Settlement Bribe Cooldown
Number of days cooldown for settlement bribes. Default is 10.
